resp = client.ml.put_data_frame_analytics(
    id="loganalytics",
    description="Outlier detection on log data",
    source={
        "index": "logdata"
    },
    dest={
        "index": "logdata_out"
    },
    analysis={
        "outlier_detection": {
            "compute_feature_influence": True,
            "outlier_fraction": 0.05,
            "standardization_enabled": True
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
